name: ionic4-template
author: Russ Carver
description: A blank starter project for Ionic 4

scripts.add-ios-dev: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run gen-config-dev && NODE_ENV=dev cordova platform add ios@5.0.0 --nosave --nofetch
scripts.add-ios-prod: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run gen-config-prod && NODE_ENV=prod cordova platform add ios@5.0.0 --nosave --nofetch
scripts.add-ios-test: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run gen-config-test && NODE_ENV=test cordova platform add ios@5.0.0 --nosave --nofetch
scripts.add-md-dev: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run gen-config-dev && NODE_ENV=dev cordova platform add android@8.0.0 --nosave --nofetch
scripts.add-md-prod: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run gen-config-prod && NODE_ENV=prod cordova platform add android@8.0.0 --nosave --nofetch
scripts.add-md-test: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run gen-config-test && NODE_ENV=test cordova platform add android@8.0.0 --nosave --nofetch
scripts.build-ios-dev: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=dev ionic cordova build ios --configuration=dev -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.build-ios-prod: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=prod ionic cordova build ios --configuration=production -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.build-ios-test: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=test onic cordova build ios --configuration=test -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.build-md-dev: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=dev ionic cordova build android --configuration=dev
scripts.build-md-prod: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=prod ionic cordova build android --configuration=production
scripts.build-md-test: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=test ionic cordova build android --configuration=test
scripts.clean: rm -rf www/* && rm -rf plugins/* && rm -rf platforms/*
scripts.refresh-project: rm package-lock.json && npm run clean && rm -rf www/* && rm -rf plugins/* && rm -rf platforms/* && rm -rf node_modules/* && npm install
scripts.run-ios-dev: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=dev ionic cordova run ios --configuration=dev -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.run-ios-prod: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=prod ionic cordova run ios --configuration=production -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.run-ios-test: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=test ionic cordova run ios --configuration=test -- --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0'
scripts.run-md-dev: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=dev ionic cordova run android --configuration=dev
scripts.run-md-prod: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=prod ionic cordova run android --configuration=production
scripts.run-md-test: npm run pre-script && NODE_ENV=test ionic cordova run android --configuration=test
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run no-csp && NODE_ENV=dev ng serve --configuration=dev
scripts.start-dev: npm run clean && npm run pre-script && npm run no-csp && NODE_ENV=dev ionic serve -c --configuration=dev
